articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Indian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, November 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Thursday met and had a talk with new Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Zile Singh who paid a courtesy call on him.
